allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Foot Vibes MVP

Application de vote emotionnel pour les joueurs de Ligue 1
- Frontend React + Vite + TailwindCSS
- Backend Express + SQLite \(sql.js\)
- 481 joueurs importes via Transfermarkt
- Systeme de vote avec rate limiting

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI: bouton downvote rouge plein, retrait emoji Milieu

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI: retrait emojis postes, logo club, bouton classement homogene

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
UI: logo club dans header mode vote

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
